description:
This puzzle game is extremely easy to use and was tailored with great care to be played by children of all ages, especially early childhood and pre-kindergarten age. It contains different difficulty-levels so it can grow with your toddler.

Balloons and Bubbles can be popped at the end of each puzzle, adding extra fun to the game.
name: Baby Puzzle - First Learning Shapes for Toddlers
intro: A puzzle collection for even the smallest toddlers. Super-easy to use “Drag and Drop” puzzles for early childhood. Now with 120+ puzzles!
